name: ngpc.tw
description: Official website for Nangang Garden Presbyterian Church in Taiwan.

scripts.lessc: lessc site/static/css/index.less > site/static/css/index.css && lessc site/static/css/weekly.less > site/static/css/weekly.css
scripts.prepare: npm run load && npm run lessc && npm run render
scripts.upload: git commit -a -m"News Update" && git push origin master && git subtree push --prefix site origin gh-pages
scripts.updatenews: npm run prepare && npm run upload

author: Eddie Lin
